titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, 16. 7. 1913
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 109; deutsch: Briefe, S. 29; Cambridge Letters, S. 32; WiC, S. 41).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks very much for the trouble you take over my business. ‒ My reason for not seeing you oftener last term was, that I did not wish our intercourse to continue without any sign that you wished to continue it.
